audioFileToByteArray(String) - Static method in class uk.fictitiousurl.audiorelay.AudioUtils
Reads the complete contents of a small audio file into a byte array
audioFormat - Variable in class uk.fictitiousurl.audiorelay.AudioRecord
A chunk is defined by an AudioFormat together with a byte array.
AudioRecord - Class in uk.fictitiousurl.audiorelay
Class to store audio "records" or "chunks", meaning a short audio recording read from a file, or transmitted using UDP.
AudioRecord(String) - Constructor for class uk.fictitiousurl.audiorelay.AudioRecord
construct AudioRecord object from a file
AudioRecord(AudioFormat, byte[]) - Constructor for class uk.fictitiousurl.audiorelay.AudioRecord
construct an audio record from an audioFormat and byte array.
AudioStore - Class in uk.fictitiousurl.audiorelay
Store used by Server to enable chunk of audio data to be relayed.

audioStore - Variable in class uk.fictitiousurl.audiorelay.Server
store for the audio information to be relayed.
audioStore - Variable in class uk.fictitiousurl.audiorelay.ServerClientHandling
 
AudioUtils - Class in uk.fictitiousurl.audiorelay
